actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit an individual to receive retroactive payments of benefits thereunder if such individual was without fault in failing to make timely application for such benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Permits an individual to receive retroactive payments of benefits under Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance if such individual was without fault in failing to make timely application for such benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit an individual to receive retroactive payments of benefits thereunder if such individual was without fault in failing to make timely application for such benefits.
